patthana17.20:1.1_0: Abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo naabyākatassa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Tīṇi veditakaṁ kātabbaṁ.)
patthana17.20:3.1_0: Abyākataṁ anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.20:3.1_1: Abyākataṁ anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.20:3.1_2: Abyākataṁ anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana17.20:4.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.20:5.1_0: Kusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.20:5.1_1: Kusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.20:5.1_2: Kusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.20:6.1_0: Akusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.20:6.1_1: Akusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.20:6.1_2: Akusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.20:7.1_0: Abyākataṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.20:7.1_1: Abyākataṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.20:7.1_2: Abyākataṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca naakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.20:8.1_0: Kusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca abyākataṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.20:9.1_0: Akusalaṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca abyākataṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana17.20:10.1_1: adhipatiyā pannarasa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pannarasa.
